feed.title: Track Awesome Crystal Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: :gem: A collection of awesome Crystal libraries, tools, frameworks and software

entry.title: Awesome Crystal Updates on Apr 29, 2025

  • sentry (⭐3) - Build/Runs your crystal application, watches files, and rebuilds/restarts app on file changes.

entry.title: Awesome Crystal Updates on Jun 14, 2021
entry.content:
Algorithms and Data structures

  • crystalg (⭐38) - A Generic Algorithm Library

CLI Utils

  • oq (⭐196) - A performant, and portable jq wrapper to facilitate the consumption and output of formats other than JSON; using jq (⭐32k) filters to transform the data

Dependency Injection

  • HardWire (⭐22) - A compile-time non-intrusive dependency injection system

Framework Components

  • mochi (⭐26) - Authentication shard inspired by Devise supporting: Authenticable, Confirmable, Invitable & more
  • motion.cr (⭐54) - Object oriented frontend library for Amber
  • tourmaline (⭐166) - Telegram bot framework with an API loosely based on telegraf.js

Misc

  • burocracia.cr (⭐21) - burocracia.cr the dependecyless shard to validate, generate and format Brazilian burocracias such as CPF, CNPJ and CEP

ORM/ODM Extensions

  • avram (⭐170) - A database wrapper for reading, writing, and migrating Postgres databases

Queues and Messaging

  • mosquito (⭐235) - Redis backed periodic and ad hoc job processing

Serverless Computing

  • secrets-env (⭐6) - Extends ENV module to read values injected by docker / kubernetes secrets and other orchestration tools

Editor Plugins

  • Geany
    • geany-crystal (⭐8) - Crystal support for the Geany editor

LSP Language Server Protocol Implementations

  • crystalline (⭐483) - Crystalline is an implementation of the Language Server Protocol written in and for the Crystal Language
